inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url for your environment region as per (documentation)[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api]

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment username

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment password

inputs.name: domainName
inputs.label: Domain Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique instance name. E.g. for :https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com, the value would be: contoso

inputs.name: friendlyName
inputs.label: Friendly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The friendly name of the instance

inputs.name: purpose
inputs.label: Purpose
inputs.helpMarkDown: The purpose of the instance

inputs.name: initialUserEmail
inputs.label: Initial User Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email of the user creating the instance

inputs.name: instanceType
inputs.label: Instance Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the instance you want provisioned

inputs.name: serviceVersion
inputs.label: Service Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service version.

inputs.name: sales
inputs.label: Sales
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install the Sales module

inputs.name: customerService
inputs.label: Customer Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install the Customer Service module

inputs.name: fieldService
inputs.label: Field Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install the Field Service module

inputs.name: projectService
inputs.label: Project Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install the Project Service module

inputs.name: languageId
inputs.label: Language Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The base language id of the instance

inputs.name: currencyCode
inputs.label: Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: The code of the currency. e.g. GBP

inputs.name: currencyName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the currency. e.g. Pound Sterling

inputs.name: currencyPrecision
inputs.label: Precision
inputs.helpMarkDown: The precision of the currency. e.g. 2

inputs.name: currencySymbol
inputs.label: Symbol
inputs.helpMarkDown: The symbol of the currency. e.g. £

inputs.name: securityGroupId
inputs.label: Security Group Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Id of the security group to be applied to target instance after copy

inputs.name: securityGroupName
inputs.label: Security Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the security group to be applied to target instance after copy. If Id is provided, this value is not used

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting this to true will cause the task to wait until the backup completes

inputs.name: sleepDuration
inputs.label: Sleep Duration (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The frequency to query the status of the backup job while waiting for completion
